Name: Ellen Gowdy
Title: Senior Growth Strategist
About:
I’m a practical optimist; I enjoy analyzing how things are, visualizing what could be, and then kicking into motion actions that will work to support that vision. I revel in learning and trying new things and I'm not a great spectator; I love doing.

In my professional life, I'm most proud of the transformations I have brought to the various companies and institutions I’ve worked with. At Smashing Boxes, my goal is to connect inspiring companies and individuals with our insatiably talented team of designers, developers, and project managers. I love my job and the creative, chaotic, inspiring mosaic that is each day at Smashing Boxes.

Outside of work, I'm a nature nut. I adore animals and pretty much any and all outdoor activities. Food and travel are two of my other great passions, and happily they tend to go quite well together. On rainy days I love to read Wikipedia, watch documentaries, or dive into my favorite personal finance blogs.
